title: GONE! t206 TWO BACKS misprint (miscut), LaPorte GONE!
author: bn2cardz

posts.post_title: GONE! t206 TWO BACKS misprint (miscut), LaPorte GONE!
posts.post_content:
t206 Laporte, Front is centered nicely but the back was misaligned during printing resulting in the back being sliced through the ad.

The front does have paper loss on the side but stays in the border so it does not detract from the picture.
[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k607/bn2cardz/bn2cardz/T206LaPorte_Pi_PR1mc_bck.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k607/bn2cardz/bn2cardz/T206LaPorte_Pi_PR1mc_frnt.jpg[/IMG]

 [strike]$170[/strike]  [strike]$120[/strike] GONE!
A major price drop.  Please feel free to make offers (including trade offers).
